name: cymulate-full-kill-chain-campaign
label: Cymulate Full Kill Chain Campaign - CART
description: Cymulate Continuous Automated Red Teaming (CART) validates security controls and responses against real-world cyber attacks to stress-test defenses and identify gaps and does network pen testing, phishing awareness, real world cyber attacks. Users can use this connector to perform automated operations for managing Full Kill-Chain Campaign module data in your Cymulate account

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Specify the Cymulate API server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.tooltip: Specify the Cymulate API server URL to connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.name: apiKey
fields.title: API Key
fields.tooltip: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.
fields.description: Specify the Secret Key of the API Application already created in the Cymulate Server.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get Campaign Report
operations.description: Retrieve the latest Full Kill-Chain Campaign report results (overview) by the environment ID

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest report results for the Default environment.

operations.title: Get Campaign Assessments IDs
operations.description: Retrieve a list of IDs for the latest Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessments.

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.tooltip: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return latest data for the Default environment
parameters.description: Specify the environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return return latest data for the Default environment

operations.title: Get Technical Report for Specific Assessment
operations.description: Retrieve Full Kill-Chain Campaign technical report results for a specific assessment

parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.name: assessment_id
parameters.tooltip: Provide an ID for the assessment you want to receive a technical report
parameters.description: Provide an ID for the assessment you want to receive a technical report

operations.title: Launch Campaign Assessment
operations.description: Launch a Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessment with the specified input parameter values

parameters.title: Template ID
parameters.name: templateID
parameters.tooltip: Provide the Template ID for the assessment you wish to launch
parameters.description: Provide the Template ID for the assessment you wish to launch

parameters.title: Schedule Time
parameters.name: schedule
parameters.tooltip: Specify the time to launch the Campaign Assessment
parameters.description: Specify the time to launch the Campaign Assessment

parameters.title: Schedule Loop
parameters.name: scheduleLoop
parameters.tooltip: Select the loop size of the schedule
parameters.description: Select the loop size of the schedule

operations.title: Stop Campaign Assessment
operations.description: Stop a Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessment that is currently running

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.tooltip: The environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped
parameters.description: The environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped

operations.title: Get Campaign Assessment History
operations.description: Retrieve the Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessment history within the date range

parameters.title: Environment ID
parameters.name: env
parameters.tooltip: The environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped
parameters.description: The environment ID. If an ID is not provided, the most recently launched assessment will be stopped

parameters.title: From Date
parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date for Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessments from this date
parameters.description: Specify the date for Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessments from this date

parameters.title: To Date
parameters.name: toDate
parameters.tooltip: Specify the date for Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessments until this date
parameters.description: Specify the date for Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessments until this date

operations.title: Get Specific Campaign Assessment Report
operations.description: Retrieve Full Kill-Chain Campaign report results for a specific assessment

parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the assessment for which you want to obtain a specific assessment report
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the assessment for which you want to obtain a specific assessment report

parameters.title: Index
parameters.name: skip
parameters.tooltip: Specify the index of the first item in the returned list.
parameters.description: Specify the index of the first item in the returned list.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the limit for the number of items to return in the result
parameters.description: Specify the limit for the number of items to return in the result

operations.title: Get Campaign Assessment Status
operations.description: Retrieve a Full Kill-Chain Campaign assessment status by the assessment ID

parameters.title: Assessment ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the assessment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return the latest run assessment
parameters.description: Specify the assessment ID. If an ID is not provided, the request will return the latest run assessment

operations.title: Get Campaign Templates
operations.description: Retrieve a list of available Full Kill-Chain Campaign templates
